welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fairfax, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport serves primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Reagan National Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Reagan National Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport serves domestic flights to various destinations in the United States.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tipton AAF Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.
